text: André Dehertoghe (19 June 1941 in Leuven – 25 August 2016) was a Belgian runner who competed in the 1968 and 1972 Summer Olympics. He finished fifth in the 1500 metres at the 1969 European Championships. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Belgian male middle- distance runners Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic athletes of Belgium
title: André Dehertoghe
